translation.en: [man] Boy! The tide is on the turn!
translation.zh: 孩子！涨潮了！

translation.en: I'm not warning you again!
translation.zh: 我不会再警告你了！

translation.en: [boy] Ships! There!
translation.zh: 船！那里！

translation.en: Danes… The devil's turds.
translation.zh: 丹麦人…恶魔的人渣

translation.en: Are they traders?
translation.zh: 他们是商人？

translation.en: No. They come as vikings! We go!
translation.zh: 不 他们是北欧海盗 我们走！

translation.en: Go! Go!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: [man] Where's my son?
translation.zh: 我的儿子在哪里？

translation.en: Uhtred, take half a dozen men and ride to the river.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 带六个男人骑马到河边

translation.en: There are pagans there, you watch them, see how many there are.
translation.zh:
有异教徒在那里
你盯着他们 看看他们有多少人！

translation.en: -Of course, Father. -Do nothing more. You understand?
translation.zh:
-好的 父亲
-什么都不要做 明白吗？

translation.en: -Yes, Father. -Osbert, what is it?
translation.zh:
-是的 父亲
-奥斯柏特 怎么回事？

translation.en: Ships! I saw them first from the beach.
translation.zh: 船！我第一个从海滩上看见他们

translation.en: -What ships? -Danes.
translation.zh:
-什么船？
-丹麦人

translation.en: They're heading for the river!
translation.zh: 他们正前往河那里！

translation.en: Oh, God and his saints preserve us. They have no soul.
translation.zh:
上帝和他的圣徒
保护我们吧 那些人没有灵魂

translation.en: -We must pray. -We must act.
translation.zh:
-我们必须祷告
-我们必须采取行动

translation.en: Uhtred, do not fight them, not a single one.
translation.zh:
乌特雷德 不要和他们对抗
任何一个也不可以

translation.en: -Be back by nightfall. -Yes, Father.
translation.zh:
-夜幕降临前回来
-是的 父亲

translation.en: They are sent by God to punish us for our sins.
translation.zh: 他们是上帝派来惩罚我们的罪

translation.en: Our sins be damned, they are here to support the Viking army in Eoferwic.
translation.zh:
那我们就是罪无可恕了
他们是来这里增援约克的维京军队的

translation.en: You must instruct the priest to pray for our deliverance.
translation.zh: 您必须指示教士祈求我们受到拯救

translation.en: -Aelfric! -Lord?
translation.zh:
-艾佛里克！
-大人？

translation.en: Get them inside!
translation.zh: 带他们到里面！

translation.en: We take in as many women and elders as we can,
translation.zh:
尽可能将可以找到的
妇女和老人带进去

translation.en: and the rest to higher ground and out of sight.
translation.zh: 剩下的到远离人们视线的高地

translation.en: Send word to rouse the country.
translation.zh: 传信唤醒国人

translation.en: I want every man inside this fortress.
translation.zh: 我要所有男人守在这堡垒里

translation.en: And every man must be prepared to die.
translation.zh: 而且所有男人必须准备赴死

translation.en: -[man 1] Port side ready to row! -[man 2] Port side ready to row!
translation.zh:
-左舷准备划桨！
-左舷准备划桨！

translation.en: -Starboard side ready to row! -Starboard side ready to row!
translation.zh:
-右舷准备划桨！
-右舷准备划桨！

translation.en: Father.
translation.zh: 父亲

translation.en: Taste.
translation.zh: 尝尝

translation.en: Land.
translation.zh: 陆地

translation.en: -Fresh. -Sweet water.
translation.zh:
-淡水
-甜水

translation.en: -Yes. -What else do you see?
translation.zh:
-是的
-你还看到了什么？

translation.en: [exhales] I see a clear river, fish as big as a man's leg.
translation.zh: 我看到清澈的河流 大如人腿的鱼

translation.en: I see a forest alive with meat,
translation.zh:
我看到一个充满生机的森林
里面的动物可作为食物

translation.en: and more than that, I see a place to grow fat and old.
translation.zh:
而且更重要的 我看到
一个可以长胖变老的地方

translation.en: Horses.
translation.zh: 马匹

translation.en: Yeah, and I see spies shitting themselves.
translation.zh: 是的 我也看到躲藏的窥探者

translation.en: [men] Yeah!
translation.zh: 是啊！

translation.en: We'll meet sword with sword! You are pagans!
translation.zh:
我们会跟你们对决！
你们这些异教徒！

translation.en: We have the greater god on our side!
translation.zh: 我们有更伟大的神站在我们这边！

translation.en: Kjartan, I think we should teach this boy a lesson.
translation.zh: 基亚藤 我想应该给这孩子一个教训

translation.en: -Taking her in. At speed. -[man] Take her to speed!
translation.zh:
-航向河道 加速
-全船加速！

translation.en: [lord] Why do I leave the villages unprotected and bring the men inside?
translation.zh:
为什么我要撤离村庄
并把男人带进里面？

translation.en: Is that your question?
translation.zh: 那是你的疑问吗？

translation.en: A village can be rebuilt, a warrior can die only once.
translation.zh:
一个村庄可以重建
但一名战士只可死一次

translation.en: The Danes may be heading south to Eoferwic.
translation.zh: 丹麦人可能向南航行到约克

translation.en: But they will kill whoever they can on the way.
translation.zh:
但是 他们会杀死
在途中可以遇到的任何人

translation.en: Now go find the priest.
translation.zh: 现在去找教士

translation.en: Yes, Father.
translation.zh: 是 父亲

translation.en: [priest] Come in, Osbert, don't skulk in the shadows.
translation.zh: 进来 奥斯柏特 不要躲在暗处

translation.en: Yeah, he wants to know if you're ready?
translation.zh: 他想知道你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Almost. Do you know what I am tasked with?
translation.zh: 差不多好了 知道我在处理什么吗？

translation.en: Um, a letter?
translation.zh: 一封信？

translation.en: A response to a letter, this letter, from King Aelle,
translation.zh: 回一封信 这封信是国王埃拉寄来的

translation.en: asking your father for his support, his army,
translation.zh: 请求你的父亲为他的军队增援

translation.en: to help recapture the city of Eoferwic.
translation.zh: 帮助夺回约克市

translation.en: This is why it is important for you to be able to read and write.
translation.zh:
这就是为什么
你能读和写是那么重要

translation.en: Father can't read nor write.
translation.zh: 父亲不会读也不会写

translation.en: Yeah, well, for your father it's too late.
translation.zh: 是啊 对你父亲而言 这些都太迟了

translation.en: King Aelle could have sent a man on horseback.
translation.zh: 国王埃拉本可以派出一个骑手

translation.en: Yeah, but who's to say the man on horseback speaks the truth
translation.zh: 是啊 但谁又能说骑手说真话了？

translation.en: or has remembered the true message?
translation.zh: 或是能记得真正的信息？

translation.en: What these letters will represent is history, facts.
translation.zh: 这些信件所代表的会是历史、事实

translation.en: Your father is informing King Aelle and King Osbert
translation.zh:
你父亲正要通知
埃拉国王和奥斯柏特国王

translation.en: he will be alongside their armies at Eoferwic.
translation.zh: 他将在约克和他们的军队一起

translation.en: And the mark of Bebbanburg will guarantee the truth of it.
translation.zh: 而贝班堡的戳记将保证它的真实性

translation.en: Why do we fight for Eoferwic?
translation.zh: 为什么我们要为约克而战？

translation.en: Well, we fight for Eoferwic because we do not wish to see England
translation.zh:
我们要为约克而战
因为我们不希望看到英格兰

translation.en: piece-by-piece become Daneland.
translation.zh: 一片一片成为丹麦领土

translation.en: I heard it said that we were pagans once,
translation.zh: 我听说 我们曾经是异教徒

translation.en: that Woden and Odin are the same.
translation.zh: 伍登神和奥汀神是相同的

translation.en: We saw the error of our ways and we looked to Rome.
translation.zh:
我们看出了我们方式的错误
继而学习罗马

translation.en: I heard the pagans have fierce gods of war.
translation.zh: 我听说异教徒有凶狠的众战神

translation.en: Well, we are right and they are mistaken.
translation.zh: 好了 我们是对的 他们是错误的

translation.en: Osbert, we are blessed.
translation.zh: 奥斯柏特 我们是受神明祝福的

translation.en: I should make you swear on Saint Cuthbert's comb
translation.zh:
我应该让你在
圣古斯柏特的梳子前发誓

translation.en: never to mention the likes of Woden again.
translation.zh: 绝不再提起诸如伍登神之类

translation.en: But what if I had a hound called Woden?
translation.zh:
但是 万一我有
一只名为伍登的猎犬？

translation.en: What if I did? What would you do, then?
translation.zh: 万一我没有 那时你会怎么做呢？

translation.en: -You have not! -What then?
translation.zh:
-你没有！
-那时你会怎么做呢？

translation.en: What about a pig called Thor?
translation.zh: 万一你有一只叫索尔的猪？

translation.en: Come, let's go see your father? Come!
translation.zh: 我们去看你的父亲 来吧！

translation.en: [Osbert] A pig called Thor…
translation.zh: 一只叫索尔的猪…

translation.en: [Osbert] Is it really Saint Cuthbert's comb?
translation.zh: 圣古斯柏特的梳子是真的吗？

translation.en: [priest] Of course it's Saint Cuthbert's comb,
translation.zh: 那是当然 这是圣古斯柏特的梳子

translation.en: and his holy hair lies in the teeth of that comb.
translation.zh: 和他的圣发在梳齿之间

translation.en: Where was your father last?
translation.zh: 你父亲刚才在哪里？

translation.en: [Osbert] He was humping the servant girl.
translation.zh: 他刚才正和他的婢女交欢

translation.en: -That's a lie, Osbert. -No.
translation.zh:
-你说谎 奥斯柏特
-没有

translation.en: Are you never gonna tire of teasing?
translation.zh: 你从不厌倦嘲讽？

translation.en: Nope!
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: [man] Horsemen approaching!
translation.zh: 骑手要到了！

translation.en: He rides Uhtred's horse.
translation.zh: 他骑着乌特雷德的马

translation.en: Osbert!
translation.zh: 奥斯柏特

translation.en: [Osbert yells] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Bury what's left of him.
translation.zh: 把他所剩的埋葬了

translation.en: Osbert, come on…
translation.zh: 奥斯柏特 过来…

translation.en: [lord] Remind me of the last words I spoke to him.
translation.zh: 还记得我对他说的最后一句话

translation.en: You told him to watch, "do not fight".
translation.zh: 你让他盯着 不要对抗

translation.en: We have no idea of the circumstance--
translation.zh: 我们不知道状况…

translation.en: -"Do not fight" means "do not fight." -He was young.
translation.zh:
-不对抗 就是不要对抗
-他还年轻

translation.en: [lord] There was no fight to be had until Eoferwic.
translation.zh: 直到约克之前不应有对抗

translation.en: [priest] You wanted to see Osbert, my lord?
translation.zh: 大人 你想见奥斯柏特？

translation.en: You…
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: You are now called Uhtred. Uhtred, son of Uhtred.
translation.zh:
你现在被称为乌特雷德了
乌特雷德 乌特雷德之子

translation.en: -You have your stone, the amber? -Yes, Father.
translation.zh:
-你有那琥珀石头？
-是的 父亲

translation.en: The priest will show you your history, the parchments.
translation.zh: 教士会告诉你你的身世 拿出羊皮纸

translation.en: Make him understand who he is.
translation.zh: 让他知道他是谁

translation.en: [priest] Lord, I should like to baptize him again.
translation.zh: 大人 我…我想要再次给他施洗

translation.en: Well, if he arrives at Heaven's gate as Uhtred,
translation.zh:
好吧 如果他像乌特雷德
一样到达天堂大门

translation.en: they may wonder what's happened to Osbert.
translation.zh:
他们可能会奇怪
奥斯柏特发生了什么事

translation.en: Do what you must, but do as I ask.
translation.zh: 做你必须做的 但依我的吩咐而行

translation.en: Lord.
translation.zh: 大人

translation.en: We were kings here once, boy.
translation.zh: 孩子 在这里我们曾经是国王！

translation.en: Kings of all the lands between the Rivers Tweed and Tyne.
translation.zh:
图得和泰恩河流域之间
所有土地的众王

translation.en: And we should be kings again.
translation.zh: 我们应该再次成为国王

translation.en: Yes, we should, but it does not matter
translation.zh: 对 我们应该 但他们称呼我们什么

translation.en: what they call us so long as they obey.
translation.zh: 那并不重要 只要他们服从

translation.en: Our ancestors took this land, and it has been strengthened with our blood and bone.
translation.zh: 我们的祖先占有这地 我们的血和骨巩固了它

translation.en: And now you are the new heir of Bebbanburg, do you hear me?
translation.zh:
现在 你是贝班堡新的继承人
你听见了吗？

translation.en: And you will die for it if needed.
translation.zh: 如果情况需要 你要为此而死

translation.en: Yes, Father. And I will give you the head of the man who killed Uhtred.
translation.zh:
是 父亲 我会提
杀死乌特雷德那人的头来见你

translation.en: No! You are Uhtred!
translation.zh: 不 你就是乌特雷德！

translation.en: Have you not been listening to me?
translation.zh: 你有没有认真听我说？

translation.en: Do not tell me what it is you will do, you are just a pup!
translation.zh:
不要告诉我你将会做什么
你只是一个幼雏！

translation.en: You will give me nothing, you will watch and you will learn!
translation.zh:
你什么都给不了
你要看而且你要学！

translation.en: Put him in the water before his mother's tongue gives me grief.
translation.zh: 在他母亲用话烦扰我之前给他洗礼

translation.en: She's not my mother.
translation.zh: 她不是我母亲

translation.en: Will you take him with you to battle to watch and learn? He's old enough.
translation.zh: 你要带他跟你上战场看和学吗？ 他够大了

translation.en: I need you to choose 30 men and remain here at Bebbanburg.
translation.zh: 我需要你选出30人留在贝班堡这里

translation.en: Protect the boy, he is the heir.
translation.zh: 保护男孩 他是继承人

translation.en: Thirty will hold and is few enough to feed. Will you do this for me?
translation.zh:
30人够防守了 且少量粮草便足矣
能为我做到这点吗？

translation.en: I'd rather be with you at Eoferwic,
translation.zh: 我宁愿在约克和你一起

translation.en: -but I'll do as you ask. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-但我会照你吩咐去做
-谢谢

translation.en: [woman] Come on, quickly. Up there, go on.
translation.zh: 来吧 快 到那里去

translation.en: [priest] Hurry, please.
translation.zh: 请赶快

translation.en: [priest] Heavenly Father, receive Your servant Uhtred
translation.zh: 天父 请接纳你的仆人 乌特雷德

translation.en: into the holy kind of saints
translation.zh: 进入圣徒的神圣群中

translation.en: and into the ranks of the most bright angels.
translation.zh: 进入最明亮的天使行列

translation.en: Let Your holy waters cleanse him and make him worthy of Your blessing.
translation.zh:
让你的圣水净化他
并让他配得上你的祝福

translation.en: Make him Your instrument and Your rod.
translation.zh: 让他成为您的器皿和您的杖

translation.en: Let him realize the significance of the written word
translation.zh: 让他了解文字的重要性

translation.en: so that he may learn of Your glory
translation.zh: 使他可以学习您的荣耀

translation.en: and, in turn, may spread Your word.
translation.zh: 从而可以传播您的话语

translation.en: -Beo-- -Let him grow in wisdom
translation.zh:
-贝…
-让他在智慧和尊重中成长

translation.en: and in respect, so he may lead in a godly manner…
translation.zh: 所以他可以在虔诚的态度中领导

translation.en: Beocca, he's cleansed.
translation.zh: 贝欧卡 他已洁净

translation.en: Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: [Beocca] Uhtred, son of Uhtred of Bebbanburg,
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 贝班堡乌特雷德之子

translation.en: welcome to the Christian world.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到基督徒的世界

translation.en: Behold your people and your lands.
translation.zh: 看 你的人民和你的土地

translation.en: [Uhtred] Where are the people, the soldiers?
translation.zh: 人们在哪里 战士呢？

translation.en: On the road to Eoferwic, led by your father.
translation.zh: 你的父亲带领着他们在往约克的路上

translation.en: He will join the other two kings of Northumbria.
translation.zh: 他将加入其他两个诺森比亚国王

translation.en: With… Without me?
translation.zh: 不…不带我？

translation.en: You are to remain at Bebbanburg with your kindly uncle.
translation.zh: 你与你和善的叔叔留守贝班堡

translation.en: I am sworn to keep you safe.
translation.zh: 我发誓要保护您的安全

translation.en: Should you wish to fight, we can arm wrestle.
translation.zh: 若您希望反抗 我们随时能扳手劲

translation.en: -Where's the priest? -With your father. Eat.
translation.zh:
-教士在哪里？
-与你的父亲一起 去吃饭

translation.en: You have work to do, Uhtred, in the stables.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 在马厩里 你有工作要做

translation.en: Thankfully, we have been left some horses.
translation.zh:
值得庆幸的是
我们已被留下来照顾马匹

translation.en: -You should eat. -[Uhtred] I'm not hungry.
translation.zh:
-你该吃东西了
-我不饿

translation.en: We have work to do, horseshit to shovel.
translation.zh: 我们有工作要做 铲马屎

translation.en: Come and find me when you've finished.
translation.zh: 当你完成时 来找我

translation.en: Scallion, if my brother falls in battle, the boy must fall.
translation.zh:
史盖里昂 如果我的兄弟
在战斗中倒下 那男孩必须死

translation.en: [man] All this way and no reception party.
translation.zh: 这一路下来竟没有接风洗尘的招待会

translation.en: Earl Ragnar.
translation.zh: 朗格纳伯爵

translation.en: Guthrum!
translation.zh: 古思伦！

translation.en: -How are you? -I'm fine, I'm hungry!
translation.zh:
-你怎么样？
-我很好 我饿了！

translation.en: -And your boy? -He's coming.
translation.zh:
-和你的男孩吗？
-他在路上

translation.en: -Ragnar. -Ubba. I brought men and horses.
translation.zh:
-朗格纳
-厄柏 我带了人马

translation.en: Good to see you. Are you well?
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 你好吧？

translation.en: You made a gift of his own son's head! How did this lord react?
translation.zh:
你带了他自己儿子的头作为礼物？
这领主有什么反应？

translation.en: He did nothing.
translation.zh: 他什么也没做

translation.en: He brought his warriors into the fortress and kept them inside.
translation.zh:
他带他的战士们进入堡垒
要他们在里面

translation.en: It was not cowardice.
translation.zh: 这不是怯懦

translation.en: Restraint. He is saving his men.
translation.zh: 克制 他救了他的人

translation.en: [Ubba] That man is Uhtred.
translation.zh: 那个人是乌特雷德

translation.en: One of the three kings of Northumbria, a warrior king.
translation.zh: 诺森比亚三王之一 一个战士之王

translation.en: The other two are fools, they'd rather be here fighting each other.
translation.zh:
另外两个是傻瓜
他们宁可在这里互相争战

translation.en: This is true?
translation.zh: 这是真的吗？

translation.en: King Aelle and King Osbert, they, uh, both lay claim to Eoferwic.
translation.zh:
国王埃拉和国王奥斯柏特
他们都声称拥有约克

translation.en: They have the strangest of names.
translation.zh: 他们有最奇怪的名字

translation.en: So, when do we fight?
translation.zh: 所以 我们什么时候开战？

translation.en: Soon, I hope.
translation.zh: 很快 我希望

translation.en: I am still to decide.
translation.zh: 我还没决定

translation.en: Fools or not, they have three armies.
translation.zh: 傻瓜与否 他们有三支军队

translation.en: -They have numbers. -[Ragnar] But are divided.
translation.zh:
-他们人数众多
-但并非团结一致

translation.en: Three kings, but only one who can lead them, this Uhtred…
translation.zh:
三个国王 但只有一个
可以带领他们 这个乌特雷德…

translation.en: Then we kill him and Northumbria is ours, all of it.
translation.zh:
那我们杀了他
诺森比亚就是我们的 所有的一切

translation.en: Listen to him, listen to the boy, he reminds me of me!
translation.zh:
听听那男孩所说的话
他让我想起了我！

translation.en: Yeah, when you were younger.
translation.zh: 是啊 当你还年轻时

translation.en: Of course when I was younger, he's just a boy.
translation.zh: 当然 当我年轻时 他只是个孩子

translation.en: -Just saying. -Did you say I was old?
translation.zh:
-只是说说
-厄柏 你是说我老了？

translation.en: -Storri? I'm not getting old. -No.
translation.zh:
-斯托瑞？我还没变老
-没有

translation.en: Ubba, I have seen the land outside the city.
translation.zh:
-斯托瑞？我还没变老
-没有 厄柏 我已看过城外的地形

translation.en: I have a plan in mind, a good plan.
translation.zh: 我心里有个很好的计划

translation.en: And my son would like to wet his sword with you.
translation.zh: 我的儿子想和你一同出战

translation.en: So do we fight?
translation.zh: 那么 我们打吗？

translation.en: Storri?
translation.zh: 斯托瑞？

translation.en: The signs are good.
translation.zh: 迹象看来都不错

translation.en: Only this morning, I saw a raven
translation.zh: 只是今早我看见一只乌鸦

translation.en: flying towards the Saxon camp,
translation.zh: 飞向撒克逊阵营

translation.en: and he was asking me to follow, I'm sure of it.
translation.zh: 神要我跟随 我敢肯定

translation.en: Then we fight.
translation.zh: 那么我们开战吧

translation.en: [Osbert] What kind of hell is this?
translation.zh: 这算是那门子战斗？

translation.en: It's a pagan's hell. We outnumber them!
translation.zh:
这是异教徒的地狱
我们在人数上能压倒他们！

translation.en: But there are more, there must be…
translation.zh: 但还有更多 必定有…

translation.en: Nothing changes. We attack with half our number,
translation.zh:
计划保持不变
我们出动一半的军队攻击

translation.en: the second half have to follow
translation.zh: 一旦我们知道他们的虚实

translation.en: once we have the measure of them.
translation.zh: 另一半也要跟进

translation.en: They have conceded to higher ground.
translation.zh: 他们已撤退到地势较高的地方

translation.en: [Osbert] King Aelle, yours and Lord Uhtred's armies will attack in the first wave.
translation.zh:
埃拉国王 你和领主
乌特雷德的军队担任第一波攻击

translation.en: Prepare! Prepare!
translation.zh: 准备！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Shield!
translation.zh: 盾！

translation.en: No… No, not without me!
translation.zh: 不…不 不可没有我！

translation.en: Come nightfall, we'll be rid of this plague
translation.zh: 夜幕降临 我们将摆脱这种折磨

translation.en: and counting our share of the plunder!
translation.zh: 并数点我们的掠夺物！

translation.en: [Aelle] My shield!
translation.zh: 我的盾牌！

translation.en: Kill them all!
translation.zh: 杀光他们！

translation.en: [Aelle] The wall is holding.
translation.zh: 人墙挡住了

translation.en: Go! Transfer all your shield and drive!
translation.zh: 快！用你们的盾牌用力推！

translation.en: Drive!
translation.zh: 用力推

translation.en: Ease.
translation.zh: 守住

translation.en: Ease!
translation.zh: 守住

translation.en: Ease!
translation.zh: 守住

translation.en: Ease!
translation.zh: 守住

translation.en: [Uhtred] Push! Keep pushing! It's working!
translation.zh: 推！继续推！有用了！

translation.en: Drive them!
translation.zh: 推开他们！

translation.en: [Beocca] They are tiring, they can't fight back.
translation.zh: 他们疲累了 他们不能还手

translation.en: -We're winning, look. -[man] We're winning…
translation.zh:
-我们要赢了 看
-我们要赢了…

translation.en: Not yet! Not yet!
translation.zh: 还不行！

translation.en: Dear God, no…
translation.zh: 亲爱的上帝 糟了…

translation.en: [Ragnar] Shieldwall!
translation.zh: 盾牌！墙！

translation.en: Dear God of infinite mercy, not this!
translation.zh:
亲爱的上帝 无限的怜悯
不要这样！

translation.en: Kill them all!
translation.zh: 杀光他们！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Legs! Legs! Protect your legs!
translation.zh: 腿！保护你的腿！

translation.en: Lift up Your sword
translation.zh: 举起你的剑

translation.en: and spare these men of England who fight in Your name.
translation.zh: 饶过这些以你之名战斗的英格兰人

translation.en: Let the heathens' hearts crumble and wither.
translation.zh: 让异教徒的勇气崩溃和枯萎

translation.en: Restore Your power upon these men of England,
translation.zh: 将你的力量灌输给这些英格兰人

translation.en: so they can glorify Your name with the blood of the devils.
translation.zh:
这样他们就可以用恶魔的血
来荣耀你的名字

translation.en: Have mercy now, lord.
translation.zh: 我主怜悯

translation.en: Do not forsake us, do not forsake England.
translation.zh: 不要抛弃我们 不要抛弃英格兰

translation.en: [Uhtred] Follow me! Follow me!
translation.zh: 跟我来！

translation.en: Take him!
translation.zh: 拿下他！

translation.en: [Ragnar] Close the shieldwall! Close the wall and take him!
translation.zh: 封闭盾墙！连接好盾墙 拿下他！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: He's like a wasp.
translation.zh: 他像一只黄蜂

translation.en: -The wasp has lost its sting. -[Ragnar] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-黄蜂已失去了它的刺
-是啊

translation.en: Are you sure he's a Saxon? He fights like a Dane.
translation.zh:
你确定他是个撒克逊人？
他打起来像个丹麦人

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Ragnar] Leave her!
translation.zh: 别伤害她！

translation.en: She is to live.
translation.zh: 她可以活下去！

translation.en: Some of these young ones can come in useful.
translation.zh: 有些年轻的可以派上用场

translation.en: Father, there's the boy I spoke of.
translation.zh: 父亲 我曾提到有个男孩

translation.en: The one who almost killed you? And you're leaving him with me?
translation.zh:
那个差点杀了你的？
你打算把他给我？

translation.en: I've never seen a man get the better of you yet.
translation.zh: 我还没见过一个人比你更好的

translation.en: [Ravn] Cut me some chicken.
translation.zh: 为我切些鸡肉

translation.en: Careful, the blade is sharp. It can kill a man.
translation.zh: 小心 刀刃很锋利 可以杀死一个人

translation.en: The chicken is on your platter.
translation.zh: 鸡肉在你的盘子里

translation.en: Have you always been blind?
translation.zh: 你一直是看不见的吗？

translation.en: Oh, I see enough.
translation.zh: 我看得多了

translation.en: So… who have they been killing below?
translation.zh: 所以…现在下面是谁被杀？

translation.en: [Uhtred] Prisoners…
translation.zh: 俘虏…

translation.en: Just now, a king.
translation.zh: 刚才是个国王

translation.en: -Did he die well? -No.
translation.zh:
-他死得好吗？
-不好

translation.en: Then he shouldn't have been king.
translation.zh: 那他不应该当王

translation.en: Tell me, who sits in the middle of the hall?
translation.zh: 告诉我 坐在大厅的中间是谁？

translation.en: Is it a big man and a small man?
translation.zh: 是一个大个男人和一个小个男人？

translation.en: [Uhtred] Yes, and a gray man sits in between them.
translation.zh: 对 一个灰色的男人坐在他们之间

translation.en: If you get to live, you should beware of the big man: Ubba.
translation.zh:
如果你想活着
你应该提防那大个子 厄柏

translation.en: My advice for you is
translation.zh: 我给你的劝告是

translation.en: to never cross Ubba and never, never fight him.
translation.zh: 绝不背叛厄柏 和绝不和他对抗

translation.en: If I get to live?
translation.zh: 如果我要活命？

translation.en: He listens to no one but the gods.
translation.zh: 除了众神外 他不听任何人

translation.en: Men who take their orders from the gods are unpredictable.
translation.zh:
从众神、领神谕旨的人
是不可预测的

translation.en: What did you mean when you said if I get to live?
translation.zh:
你是什么意思？
当你说如果我要活命？

translation.en: You're my prisoner.
translation.zh: 你是我的俘虏

translation.en: The gray man will be Egbert, he's a Saxon ealdorman.
translation.zh:
灰色男人将会是西撒克逊国王
他是一个撒克逊郡长

translation.en: He has pledged allegiance and now he calls himself a king.
translation.zh: 他曾宣誓效忠 而现在他称自己为王

translation.en: He is king of nothing.
translation.zh: 他是无国之王

translation.en: Soon all of the kings in England shall be kings of nothing.
translation.zh:
很快所有在英格兰的诸王
将成为无国之王

translation.en: Northumbria's ours, Mercia will soon by ours.
translation.zh:
诺森比亚是我们的了
麦西亚很快就会是我们的

translation.en: Then East Anglia, Cornwallum,
translation.zh: 然后东盎格利亚 康沃伦

translation.en: and then the greatest prize is the last kingdom: Wessex.
translation.zh:
然后最大的奖项是最后的王国
威塞克斯

translation.en: I've heard of Wessex.
translation.zh: 我听说过威塞克斯

translation.en: Anything will grow in Wessex.
translation.zh: 任何东西在威塞克斯都能生长

translation.en: Tell me your name.
translation.zh: 告诉我你的名字

translation.en: Uhtred… I am the ealdorman of Bebbanburg.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德…我是贝班堡的郡长

translation.en: You are, huh?
translation.zh: 你是？

translation.en: I am… I own lands to the north.
translation.zh: 我是…我拥有一直到北方的土地

translation.en: How long have you been an ealdorman of these lands?
translation.zh: 你是这些土地的郡长多久了？

translation.en: Your father chose to fight us
translation.zh: 你父亲选择跟我们战斗

translation.en: and he's now… dead.
translation.zh: 而现在…死了

translation.en: He… He was not fond of me.
translation.zh: 他…他不喜欢我

translation.en: I now understand why my son spared you…
translation.zh:
我现在明白为什么
我的儿子饶了你…

translation.en: Uhtred of Bebbanburg, you are a warrior.
translation.zh: 贝班堡的乌特雷德 你是一名战士

translation.en: Have some ale.
translation.zh: 喝点麦酒

translation.en: Drink it…
translation.zh: 喝了…

translation.en: lots of it.
translation.zh: 多喝点

translation.en: [man] Here.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: Take it up there.
translation.zh: 拿去那里

translation.en: I am thinking of keeping them both,
translation.zh: 我想保留他们两个

translation.en: the boy and the girl They can help your mother.
translation.zh: 男孩和女孩 他们可以帮助你母亲

translation.en: Disagree?
translation.zh: 不同意？

translation.en: No, but we did kill his father.
translation.zh: 没有 但我们已杀掉他们的父亲

translation.en: And if he is an ealdorman, we could sell him for ransom.
translation.zh:
而且如果他是一个郡长
我们可以卖掉他获得赎金

translation.en: Perhaps.
translation.zh: 可能可以

translation.en: [woman] Brida, be careful not to spill the water.
translation.zh: 布丽达 要小心 不要把水洒出来

translation.en: You'll turn the floor to mud.
translation.zh: 你把地板上弄得都是泥

translation.en: Uhtred, wood needs to be chopped.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 去砍材

translation.en: Brida, you can do the goats.
translation.zh: 布丽达 去照顾山羊

translation.en: [girl] Will there be time for Uhtred to play?
translation.zh: 有时间让乌特雷德玩吗？

translation.en: Only when work is done.
translation.zh: 只有当工作完成时

translation.en: [Ragnar] I don't like our daughter having to play with the slaves.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢我们的女儿和奴隶一起玩

translation.en: -They're only children. -They have a place.
translation.zh:
-他们只是孩子
-他们有一个地方

translation.en: Grumpy…
translation.zh: 脾气暴躁的…

translation.en: [man] My horse.
translation.zh: 我的马

translation.en: Hey, Ragnar Ragnarson!
translation.zh: 嘿 朗格纳朗纳森！

translation.en: Hey, Uhtred of… wherever.
translation.zh: 嗨 乌特雷德什么的

translation.en: How about you teach me how to use a sword.
translation.zh: 你教我怎样用剑好吗？

translation.en: We don't teach slaves how to fight.
translation.zh: 我们不教奴隶怎么打战

translation.en: That tongue of yours will be your death, boy.
translation.zh:
孩子 你那舌头所说的
将给你带来死亡

translation.en: Now get back to work!
translation.zh: 现在回去工作！

translation.en: What does the play involve?
translation.zh: 这游戏在玩什么？

translation.en: We built a hall in the gorge.
translation.zh: 我们在峡谷建一个大厅

translation.en: I'm a mistress and Uhtred is a warrior.
translation.zh: 我是情妇 乌特雷德是战士

translation.en: -Not a servant? -It is a game.
translation.zh:
-不是仆人？
-这是一个游戏

translation.en: -[Uhtred] A wolf? -[Brida] Uhtred!
translation.zh:
-狼？
-乌特雷德！

translation.en: -That was it, a wolf. -Boar, watch out!
translation.zh:
-就是这样 一只狼
-当心野猪！

translation.en: I saw it, it's sharp teeth and yellow eyes.
translation.zh:
我看到它了 锋利的牙齿
和黄色的眼睛

translation.en: Don't let the wolves get to me, Uhtred.
translation.zh: 不要让狼靠近我 乌特雷德

translation.en: Use the fire to keep them away.
translation.zh: 用火赶开它们

translation.en: I see them. They are as big as Ubba and smell worse.
translation.zh:
我看到它们了
它们像是大厄柏而且气味更糟

translation.en: Did you see that?
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？

translation.en: [girl] Uhtred?
translation.zh: 乌特雷德？

translation.en: Stay up there.
translation.zh: 留在那

translation.en: [Brida gasps] Look!
translation.zh: 看！

translation.en: Uhtred, what is happening?
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 发生了什么？

translation.en: Stay up there, Thyra.
translation.zh: 留在那里 图萝

translation.en: It's Sven, he won't hurt you.
translation.zh: 是斯文 他不会伤你的

translation.en: [Brida] But he'll kill us.
translation.zh: 但他会杀了我们

translation.en: [Brida] He will kill us! Run!
translation.zh: 他会杀了我们！快跑！

translation.en: That was a real sword!
translation.zh: 那是真正的剑！

translation.en: I saw it.
translation.zh: 我看到了

translation.en: -Uhtred! Uhtred! -Thyra!
translation.zh:
-乌特雷德！
-图萝！

translation.en: What's this? You been fighting again?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？你又和别人打架了？

translation.en: [Uhtred] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: With Sven?
translation.zh: 跟斯文？

translation.en: Kjartan's son?
translation.zh: 基亚藤的儿子？

translation.en: [Uhtred] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Uhtred, he's much bigger than you.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 他比你大多了

translation.en: -He's a turd. -Why do you say that?
translation.zh:
-他是一个人渣
-你为何这么说？

translation.en: [Ravn] Who started it?
translation.zh: 谁先开始的？

translation.en: -Who began the fight? -[Uhtred] I began the fight.
translation.zh:
-谁先开始打的？
-我先开始打的

translation.en: For no other reason than that he's a turd?
translation.zh:
没有别的理由
只是因为他是个人渣？

translation.en: Danes have murdered for less.
translation.zh: 丹麦人杀戮的理由更少

translation.en: [woman] Uhtred, that's enough!
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 够了！

translation.en: -You want to be sold boy? -I wish to eat.
translation.zh:
-你想被卖掉吗 男孩？
-我想吃饭

translation.en: -[Ragnar] Speak up. -I wish to eat!
translation.zh:
-说出来
-我想吃饭！

translation.en: You want to eat?
translation.zh: 你想吃饭？

translation.en: You want to eat?
translation.zh: 你想吃饭？

translation.en: You know what? I say you starve.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我说你饿昏头了

translation.en: Fighting is expected, disobedience is not.
translation.zh: 打斗是允许的 不服从是不允许的

translation.en: Sven began the fight!
translation.zh: 斯文先开始打斗的！

translation.en: [Ragnar] Kjartan! Kjartan!
translation.zh: 基亚藤！

translation.en: Earl Ragnar, let me first say he's a… he's a good boy.
translation.zh:
朗格纳伯爵 让我先声明
他是…他是个好孩子

translation.en: He brought this sword onto my land. I will have words with him.
translation.zh:
他带这把剑到我的土地上
我有话跟他说

translation.en: In time, he'll serve on your ship. He… he--
translation.zh: 将来 他会在你的船上服务 他…

translation.en: -He's offended me. -He'll honor you
translation.zh: 他得罪我了 他将尊崇你 他没有恶意 阁下

translation.en: and he meant no harm, lord.
translation.zh: 他将尊崇你 他没有恶意 阁下

translation.en: He meant no harm?
translation.zh: 他没有恶意？

translation.en: He looked at my daughter's nakedness.
translation.zh: 他看了我女儿的裸体

translation.en: And he was punished, your Saxon slave cut him.
translation.zh:
他已受到了惩罚
你的撒克逊奴隶砍了他

translation.en: [Ragnar] Shall I make a square of branches?
translation.zh: 这样我就应当放过他吗？

translation.en: Are you gonna fight me for your son or fetch him?
translation.zh:
你打算为你的儿子
跟我决斗或是捉拿他？

translation.en: Sven! Come out here.
translation.zh: 斯文！出来

translation.en: Tell him what you have to say.
translation.zh: 告诉他你应该说的

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -He can't hear you.
translation.zh:
-对不起
-他听不到你说的

translation.en: I'm sorry, lord, for what I did.
translation.zh: 大人 我为我所做的感到抱歉

translation.en: You laid hands on my daughter. You stripped her naked.
translation.zh:
你对我的女儿下手
剥了她的衣服让她裸体

translation.en: -Half naked, lord. -He is at an age, lord.
translation.zh:
-半裸 大人
-他已到了一定年纪 阁下

translation.en: -Is this true, half naked? -Yes, lord.
translation.zh:
-真的吗 半裸？
-是的 大人

translation.en: Then I shall only take his one eye.
translation.zh: 那我应该只要他的一只眼睛

translation.en: [Kjartan] No, lord, please!
translation.zh: 阁下 请不要！

translation.en: [Ragnar] Kjartan, you are banished from my land.
translation.zh: 基亚藤 你从我的土地被驱逐了

translation.en: I have something for you.
translation.zh: 我有东西给你

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: An amulet, Thor's hammer.
translation.zh: 一个护身符 雷神索尔的锤子

translation.en: Ah, but, um…
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: But what?
translation.zh: 但是什么？

translation.en: You're Christian.
translation.zh: 你是基督徒

translation.en: Take it.
translation.zh: 拿去

translation.en: -I can't. -Don't you want it?
translation.zh:
-我拿不到
-难道你不想要吗？

translation.en: -I… I do want it! -Take it.
translation.zh:
-我…我真的想要！
-拿去！

translation.en: -I'm trying. -Take it!
translation.zh:
-我在试着拿
-拿去！

translation.en: -[Uhtred grunts] -I don't think he wants it.
translation.zh: 我不认为他想要

translation.en: -I… I do want it! -No, I don't think so.
translation.zh:
-我…我真的想要！
-不 我不这么认为

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Tell me about Denmark…
translation.zh: 告诉我有关丹麦…

translation.en: your home.
translation.zh: …你的家

translation.en: What can I say about Denmark?
translation.zh: 关于丹麦我能些说什么？

translation.en: It's wet.
translation.zh: 潮湿

translation.en: And harsh… and the ground is so flat and sandy
translation.zh: 恶劣…地是那么平坦 多沙 你种不出个屁来

translation.en: you can't grow a fart.
translation.zh: 多沙 你种不出个屁来

translation.en: Which is why we are here in England.
translation.zh: 这就是我们在英格兰这里的原因

translation.en: To grow.
translation.zh: 为了耕种

translation.en: And why young Ragnar will soon be going for Ireland.
translation.zh:
以及为什么小朗格纳
很快就会去爱尔兰

translation.en: You leave to fight?
translation.zh: 你要去打仗？

translation.en: To make my wealth.
translation.zh: 为了寻找我的财富

translation.en: If you want land or silver, you have to take it.
translation.zh: 如果你想要土地或银子 你必须去拿

translation.en: You made me… proud today… Uhtred…
translation.zh: 你使我…今天感到骄傲 乌特雷德

translation.en: You made me proud.
translation.zh: 你使我感到骄傲

translation.en: [Aelfric] I don't know you. You don't have the appearance of a messenger
translation.zh: 我不认识你 你没穿信使的服饰

translation.en: and Ubba's payments not yet due.
translation.zh: 给厄柏钱的时间还没到

translation.en: No, lord, I was a ship's master.
translation.zh: 不 阁下 我曾经是个船长

translation.en: Ah, well I have no ships, I need no ship's master.
translation.zh: 我没有船 我不需要船长

translation.en: I have news that you will want to hear.
translation.zh: 我有个你会想听到的消息

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: I would want something in return, lord.
translation.zh: 我想要一些东西作为回报 阁下

translation.en: Not now, not quite.
translation.zh: 不是现在 也不是很多

translation.en: But perhaps we could continue to help each other.
translation.zh: 但也许我们可以持续互相帮助

translation.en: Perhaps.
translation.zh: 或许吧

translation.en: Two days south of here.
translation.zh: 这儿往南两天

translation.en: This little rat with the man I used to serve until he banished me.
translation.zh:
我这微小的报信人曾效忠一个人
直到他把我逐出

translation.en: He has a slave, treats him well.
translation.zh: 他有一个奴隶 对他很好

translation.en: This is a slave you are entitled to buy back if you wish to.
translation.zh:
如果你想要
这是一个你有权买回来的奴隶

translation.en: Buy back?
translation.zh: 买回来？

translation.en: It's your nephew Uhtred, lord. He lives.
translation.zh:
是你的侄子 乌特雷德
大人 他还活着

translation.en: [Uhtred] What if I'm against being ransomed?
translation.zh: 如果我反对被赎回呢？

translation.en: Your family has discovered that you're still alive,
translation.zh: 你的家人发现你还活着

translation.en: and they wish for you to be returned. But they must pay.
translation.zh: 他们希望你回去 但他们必须付赎金

translation.en: Pay Ragnar?
translation.zh: 付给朗格纳？

translation.en: Ubba takes more than half. It's normal.
translation.zh: 厄柏拿超过一半 这很正常

translation.en: But I have no family.
translation.zh: 但我没有家人

translation.en: [Ragnar] Keep them over there, tether the horses.
translation.zh: 让他们停在那里 系好马匹缰绳

translation.en: Scallion, here.
translation.zh: 史盖里昂 这里

translation.en: Uhtred. Are they treating you well?
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 他们对你好吗？

translation.en: I am fed, yes.
translation.zh: 是的 没让我饿着

translation.en: Good, good. That's all we ask.
translation.zh: 好 这就是我们所希望的

translation.en: And what is that around your neck, some symbol?
translation.zh:
你脖子上戴着的是什么
是什么象征吗？

translation.en: Oh, this… They make me wear it.
translation.zh: 这个…他们要我戴的

translation.en: May I see it?
translation.zh: 我可以看看吗？

translation.en: Look, I will speak plainly. Your uncle will kill you.
translation.zh: 听着 我坦白说了 你的叔叔要杀你

translation.en: Right? You cannot go back to Bebbanburg, you must escape.
translation.zh: 对 你不能回贝班堡 你必须逃亡

translation.en: He wants to be the ealdorman. He wants to be the king, in fact,
translation.zh:
他希望成为郡长
实际上 他想成为国王

translation.en: like the pathetic Egbert over there.
translation.zh: 像那边可悲的艾格柏特

translation.en: A puppet king for his Danish masters.
translation.zh: 为他的丹麦主子作傀儡王

translation.en: You should go to Wessex.
translation.zh: 你应该去威塞克斯

translation.en: King Aethelred, real King Aethelred,
translation.zh: 找真正的埃塞雷国王

translation.en: and his brother the Prince Alfred,
translation.zh: 和他的兄弟 艾佛雷德王子

translation.en: they are good men, good Christian men.
translation.zh: 他们是好人 好基督徒

translation.en: [Ragnar] That is enough whispering in his ear, priest.
translation.zh: 在他耳边低语够多了 教士

translation.en: -Uhtred! -One more word and I'll have your balls.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 再说一字 我将拿你的阴囊当钱包

translation.en: [whispers] I will meet you there.
translation.zh: 我会在那里等你

translation.en: [speaks normally] That will not be necessary.
translation.zh: 那没必要

translation.en: What did he say?
translation.zh: 他说什么？

translation.en: He… He asked if you were treating me well.
translation.zh: 他…他问你是否对我很好

translation.en: -[Aelfric] How much? -[Ravn] Three hundred.
translation.zh:
-多少？
-三百

translation.en: [Aelfric] That is a ridiculous amount.
translation.zh: 这是个荒唐的金额

translation.en: How can a boy be worth 300 pieces of silver?
translation.zh: 一个男孩怎能值得300块银子？

translation.en: Because I say so, because he is a lord, an ealdorman.
translation.zh:
因为我说的
因为他是个领主 一个郡长

translation.en: He is a boy.
translation.zh: 他是个男孩

translation.en: I am the ealdorman of Bebbanburg.
translation.zh: 我是贝班堡的郡长

translation.en: I carry the seal and the banner.
translation.zh: 我有戳记和横幅

translation.en: That seal is my father's, which is now mine!
translation.zh: 戳记是我父亲的 现在是我的了！

translation.en: You will be silent. You are for sale, nothing more.
translation.zh: 你闭嘴 你仅是个待出售物

translation.en: -For ransom, lord. -That is what I said.
translation.zh:
-有关赎金 阁下
-就如我说的

translation.en: My lords, I have given up land, horses,
translation.zh: 大人 我已献上了土地 马匹

translation.en: I have offered a generous supply of food as well as my sword.
translation.zh:
我已经提供了
慷慨的食物供应以及我的剑

translation.en: All I ask in return is a fair price for my only nephew.
translation.zh:
我所要求的回报是一个
我唯一侄子的公平价格

translation.en: [Ravn] What would you say is a fair price?
translation.zh: 你说的公平价格是多少？

translation.en: [Aelfric] I will offer 100 pieces of silver.
translation.zh: 我可以给100块银子

translation.en: [Ravn] Two hundred.
translation.zh: 两百

translation.en: My allegiance and 100 pieces is surely a fair price.
translation.zh:
我的忠诚和100块
肯定是个公平的价格

translation.en: [Ravn] It is not.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: I will give 120 pieces of silver for the boy.
translation.zh: 我给120块银子买男孩

translation.en: [Ravn chuckles] Not enough!
translation.zh: 不够

translation.en: Very well, 200 pieces.
translation.zh: 很好 200块

translation.en: I agree to your terms.
translation.zh: 我同意你的条件

translation.en: The boy's sold to Earl Ragnar.
translation.zh: 男孩卖给朗格纳伯爵了

translation.en: -What? -Ransomed, lord!
translation.zh:
-什么？
-赎回 阁下！

translation.en: That's what I said! So the matter is closed!
translation.zh: 我说了算！因此这事已了结！

translation.en: My lords, I have come a long way,
translation.zh: 大人 我长途跋涉而来

translation.en: I have offered my allegiance.
translation.zh: 我已表达了我的忠诚

translation.en: Which is why you are allowed to breathe.
translation.zh: 这是为什么你还能够呼吸

translation.en: If you have an argument, it's with me now.
translation.zh: 如果你还有意见 现在是针对我了

translation.en: If business is done, we have ale to drink.
translation.zh: 如果生意成交 我们去喝麦酒吧

translation.en: And King Egbert needs to sit.
translation.zh: 而艾格柏特国王特需要参加

translation.en: [Uhtred] Am I not for ransom anymore?
translation.zh: 我不会再被卖了吗？

translation.en: [Ragnar] You heard Ubba, I bought you.
translation.zh: 你听到厄柏说的 我买了你

translation.en: I thought I might sacrifice you to Odin.
translation.zh: 我想我可以把你献祭给奥汀神

translation.en: You bought me for how much?
translation.zh: 你花了多少钱买我？

translation.en: -Too much. -How much is too much?
translation.zh:
-太多
-太多是多少钱？

translation.en: My sword's weight in silver.
translation.zh: 像我的剑那么重的银子

translation.en: I agree, I may have been robbed,
translation.zh: 我同意 我可能已经被抢劫了

translation.en: but we like you boy, we're going to keep you.
translation.zh: 但孩子我们喜欢你 我们会留下你

translation.en: [Uhtred] Does this mean I'm a Dane?
translation.zh: 这是否意味着我是丹麦人？

translation.en: It means is you are Uhtred Ragnarson. You are a son to me now.
translation.zh: 这意味着你是乌特雷德朗纳森 你现在是我的儿子了

translation.en: Brida, not that way! Take the goat out the side.
translation.zh:
布丽达 不是这样！
带山羊出去到一边

translation.en: Next time, I promise!
translation.zh: 下一次 我保证！

translation.en: [Thyra] Mother, look!
translation.zh: 母亲 看！

translation.en: It's beautiful, it really is.
translation.zh: 很美丽 确实很美

translation.en: I can't believe I'm losing you already!
translation.zh: 我不敢相信我要失去你了！

translation.en: I will be living across the field.
translation.zh: 我将要横越田野生活

translation.en: And if he doesn't treat you well, you come right back across that field.
translation.zh: 如果他对你不好 你只要转头横越田野回来

translation.en: [Uhtred] Oh, look at this place…
translation.zh: 哦 看看这个地方…

translation.en: Uhtred, do you like my wedding necklace?
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 你喜欢我的婚礼项链吗？

translation.en: I do, very pretty.
translation.zh: 喜欢 很漂亮

translation.en: [Ravn] He doesn't know anything about necklaces.
translation.zh: 他对项链一无所知

translation.en: You might as well ask me.
translation.zh: 你还不如问我

translation.en: Uhtred, with me. You can help me slaughter the goats.
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 跟我来你可以帮我宰羊

translation.en: [Uhtred] I've only just washed.
translation.zh: 我刚刚才洗过澡

translation.en: [Ragnar chuckles] The goats will be pleased.
translation.zh: 山羊会很高兴的

translation.en: [Brida] Later you can sweep the floor.
translation.zh: 之后你可以扫地

translation.en: Move over!
translation.zh: 转过来！

translation.en: [Ragnar] This is an excuse to talk, that's all.
translation.zh: 这是一个说话的借口 就这样

translation.en: With Thyra to be married, maybe it's time you got together with Brida.
translation.zh:
随着图萝要结婚了
可能这是你和布丽达在一起的时候

translation.en: There are men, good men, asking about her.
translation.zh: 有好男人 探询关于她的婚嫁事宜

translation.en: So you have to decide what you are to her, what you are to each other.
translation.zh:
所以 你必须决定你对她的意义
你们对彼此的意义

translation.en: [chuckles] Brida has her own mind.
translation.zh: 布丽达有她自己的想法

translation.en: She has… but I see the way she looks at you.
translation.zh: 她有…但我看见她凝视你的样子

translation.en: She's watching the charcoal tonight in the woods.
translation.zh: 今晚在树林中 她会看守炭火

translation.en: Take my horse and join her.
translation.zh: 牵我的马去和她一起

translation.en: -The earth will be warm. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 大地将会很暖和

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？

translation.en: I just thought, in order to be a real Dane, I had to marry a Dane.
translation.zh:
我只是在想要成为一个真正的丹麦人
就必须娶丹麦人

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: I love you like I love young Ragnar.
translation.zh: 我爱你就像我爱小朗格纳

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Do you ever think of your English life,
translation.zh: 你是否想过你的英格兰生活？

translation.en: who you were before we came to Ragnar?
translation.zh: 我们来到了朗格纳之前 你的生活？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Do you?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: -I think of who I-- -Shh!
translation.zh: 我想我是谁…

translation.en: Voices…
translation.zh: 声音…

translation.en: Men below.
translation.zh: 有人在下面

translation.en: Danes. Who are they?
translation.zh: 丹麦人 他们是谁？

translation.en: [man whispers] This way…
translation.zh: 这边…

translation.en: That's Kjartan! Remember him?
translation.zh: 是基亚藤！记得他吗？

translation.en: That must be Sven.
translation.zh: 那个一定是斯文

translation.en: This is wrong. We need to tell Ragnar.
translation.zh: 这有问题 我们需要告诉朗格纳

translation.en: They are between us and the wall.
translation.zh: 他们在我们与墙之间

translation.en: Then we go up and around, we leave the horses and run.
translation.zh:
那我们从上面绕过去
留下马匹 跑过去

translation.en: [whispering] In front of the door. That's it!
translation.zh: 到门前 就是这！

translation.en: [Ravn] Ragnar, smoke!
translation.zh: 朗格纳 烟！

translation.en: Fire!
translation.zh: 着火了！

translation.en: Thyra! Wake up!
translation.zh: 要命！醒醒！

translation.en: Wake up! Fire!
translation.zh: …醒醒！着火了！

translation.en: [Ragnar] Come on! come on!
translation.zh: 赶紧！

translation.en: [woman] This way. Ravn!
translation.zh: 这边 瑞文！

translation.en: Come. Come quickly.
translation.zh: 来 快来

translation.en: Come!
translation.zh: 来！

translation.en: -The door is blocked! -[Ragnar] So is this one!
translation.zh:
-门被堵住了！
-这个也是！

translation.en: Be ready.
translation.zh: 准备

translation.en: This one's open, this one's open!
translation.zh: 这个打开了！

translation.en: Come on, follow me! This way!
translation.zh: 来吧 跟我来 这边走

translation.en: [Kjartan] Archers!
translation.zh: 弓箭手！

translation.en: [Ragnar] Don't go up there, wait for me!
translation.zh: 不要去那里 等我！

translation.en: [woman] Come. Come!
translation.zh: 来 来吧！

translation.en: Ragnar!
translation.zh: 朗格纳！

translation.en: Close the doors, we have Thyra.
translation.zh: 关闭大门 我们有图萝

translation.en: Let the rest burn.
translation.zh: 让剩下的继续烧

translation.en: Take her with you to Valhalla.
translation.zh: 带她跟着你 到奥汀的天堂

translation.en: -Yes. -I will meet you there.
translation.zh:
-好的
-我会在那里等你

translation.en: [Brida] Oh, no…
translation.zh: 不好了…

translation.en: Find the silver!
translation.zh: 寻找银子！

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 马上去！

translation.en: They're searching for Ragnar's wealth.
translation.zh: 他们正在寻找朗格纳的财富

translation.en: They'll never find it.
translation.zh: 他们永远也找不到

translation.en: [Kjartan] Search in the back! Come on, were leaving soon.
translation.zh: 搜索后面！快点 我们要尽快离开

translation.en: [Sven] You thought I'd let you marry someone else?
translation.zh: 你以为我会让你嫁给别人

translation.en: But… do you know what I will do with this body…
translation.zh: 但是…你知道我会对这身子做什么…

translation.en: this… mouth?
translation.zh: …这嘴？

translation.en: I will do all I have dreamt of… and more.
translation.zh: 我会做所有我梦想做的…甚至更多

translation.en: And who will call a halt?
translation.zh: 谁会来阻挡呢？

translation.en: Earl Ragnar the Fearless is gone.
translation.zh: 大无畏的朗格纳伯爵已经死了

translation.en: And, with him, Uhtred,
translation.zh: 和他一起的是乌特雷德

translation.en: his Saxon pet, a pile of ashes.
translation.zh: 他的撒克逊宠物 已成一堆灰烬

translation.en: Anything.
translation.zh: 任何事情

translation.en: Get down!
translation.zh: 趴下！

translation.en: Look at that man, the Saxon. His name is Scallion.
translation.zh:
看看那个撒克逊人
他的名字是史盖里昂

translation.en: He works with my uncle. He'll tell him that I'm dead.
translation.zh:
他和我的叔叔一起工作
他会告诉他 我已经死了

translation.en: -Let him do it. -I see him with Kjartan.
translation.zh:
-让他去吧
-我看到他和基亚藤一起

translation.en: [Kjartan] Burn it to the ground.
translation.zh: 全部烧光

translation.en: [Brida] He and your uncle maybe are in it together!
translation.zh:
他和你叔叔
也许他们一起参与其中？

translation.en: And what makes them believe they can do this without punishment?
translation.zh:
是什么让他们相信
自己能做这事不会受惩罚？

translation.en: Shh! They will be punished, but not by you.
translation.zh: 他们将受到惩罚 但不是由你

translation.en: Uhtred, listen to me, we serve Ragnar best alive, we tell the story.
translation.zh:
乌特雷德 听我说 我们帮助朗格纳
最好的方式是活着 讲出整件事

translation.en: -I need to kill someone. -No.
translation.zh:
-我要杀人
-不要

translation.en: And I choose him.
translation.zh: 而我选择他

translation.en: Uhtred, no!
translation.zh: 乌特雷德 不要！

translation.en: [man] Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: [Kjartan] The main thing is to keep the horses together, yeah.
translation.zh: 最主要的是让马在一起 对啊

translation.en: Don't leave any weapons behind.
translation.zh: 不要留下任何武器

translation.en: Move those over and we'll look in the back.
translation.zh: 把那些搬走 我们去后面看看

translation.en: Don't leave anything in there, just bring it all out.
translation.zh:
不要留下任何东西在那里
要全部带走

translation.en: -Yeah, come on. -[man] Over here!
translation.zh:
-是啊 来吧
-在这儿！

translation.en: OK, come on.
translation.zh: 好 来吧

translation.en: You know who I am? It's me you're looking for.
translation.zh: 你知道我是谁 你要寻找的是我

translation.en: It's me you're looking for.
translation.zh: 你要寻找的是我

translation.en: You remember me? You remember me?
translation.zh: 你记得我吗？

translation.en: -There's no more. We are going! -Come on!
translation.zh:
-没有东西了！我们要走了
-走吧

translation.en: [Kjartan] Bring the horses.
translation.zh: 带马过来

translation.en: By right, it belongs to young Ragnar.
translation.zh: 根据权利 它属于小朗格纳

translation.en: [Brida] Yes…
translation.zh: 对…

translation.en: But we spend what we need to spend. We stay alive.
translation.zh:
但我们取我们所需的
我们得继续活下去

translation.en: We tell the story and then what?
translation.zh: 我们说出整件事 然后呢？

translation.en: We find a new lord to serve.
translation.zh: 我们找个新主人服侍

translation.en: I will not stand by and have everything that is mine taken from me.
translation.zh:
我不会再袖手旁观
让我所拥有一切被人从我这儿拿走

translation.en: I'm going back.
translation.zh: 我要回去…

translation.en: Where?
translation.zh: 哪里？

translation.en: To the beginning.
translation.zh: 到开始时

translation.en: -Is it Scallion? -No, my lord.
translation.zh:
-是史盖里昂吗？
-不 大人

translation.en: -He looks like a Dane. -Could be one of Kjartan's men.
translation.zh:
-他看起来像个丹麦人
-可能是基亚藤的人

translation.en: I am Uhtred of Bebbanburg, and I shall take what is mine!
translation.zh:
我是贝班堡的乌特雷德
我要拿回属于我的一切！

translation.en: Bebbanburg is mine!
translation.zh: 贝班堡是我的！

translation.en: Horses!
translation.zh: 备马！
